nodes.text: Meteor Strike!! was a roller coaster ride that was located in Greentree Pointe, on the moon Dorumaa.

The ride was constructed during the waning years of the Galactic Republic, to commemorate a meteor that struct Greentree Pointe. During the Clone Wars, the heroes of Cularin confronted a group of thugs led by Phis Benlip, next to the ride. The thugs fled onto the roller coaster and the heroes pursued them, causing a firefight on the ride.
